casebody.data:
Price, Appellee, v. Henry; Basinger et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Price v. Henry (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 521.]

(No. 00-629 Submitted July 25, 2000 Decided August 3, 2000.) Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and M. Scott Criss, Assistant Attorney General, for appellants.

The discretionary appeal is allowed, the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Woods v. Telb (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 504, 733 N.E.2d 1103, and the cause is remanded for judgment consistent with Woods.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
